amendment.description: Amendment adds a new section creating a stormwater reuse and recycling technology demonstration program within the Environmental Protection Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-82 to create a wastewater and stormwater reuse and recycling technology demonstration program within the Environmental Protection Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
